reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rug came folded up in a box. It fluffed up immediately after opening. It is a beautiful (light) mauve color and a little slippery to walk on barefooted at first and until you get use to it. It stays in place. Larger than I thought (8 x 10). The rug is a really good deal for the price and how it’s shipped free and compact in a box you can lift and handle by yourself. It would be best with a pad underneath if you want a thicker feel underfoot, but it’s not necessary; soft and flat feeling otherwise.. The yarns are good length for shag type rug. Mauve color is difficult to find anywhere else, so definitely worth the price to me, and very pleased with this purchase. We love it! (Just purchased so do not know about stain resistance or if easy to clean or not. It is a soft feeling rug.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft affordable rug
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect for the price, we are using it in front of the firewood stove. It feels very soft, no dye colors like some others, we are using vacuum to clean it and is working perfectly. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm currently in shared housing were I rent a single bedroom, working on getting my own place atleast a studio apartment, my carpet white with stains, you wouldnt believe the complements I get for keeping my room clean and this rug, puts it all together, it's soft nice and well made,, little hard to clean but would rect, if your renting a room or in a dorm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved the plushiness of this rug, however little fuzzlies get stuck in pretty easily and it can be hard to get it all out at times. BUT it is machine washable, and it doesnt affect the plush too much for the first 2 washes.. after that it seemed to get more dull. I still like it, its perfect for my room and LOVE the black.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought a “used” cream rug for a great price. By now I know that used just means it was returned. I also know I can return it if there’s any problems. The rug came and it was perfect. I was surprised at how small the box was, but it turns out the rug was folded and vacuum-sealed. The rug has a nice padded back on it—like a nice padded bath mat. The rug was nice and soft and the shag part was really soft to the touch. The rug didn’t shed (a problem I’ve had with other shag rugs). I’m planning to buy rugs for a few other rooms in the house. I love that they are washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these rug!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these and love them both. They are so soft and the colors are perfect. It perfect for my kids’ rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as advertised 😅
reviews.reviewText: Very thin compared to advertised photo but for the price it’s pretty descent. I wanted to make my space more cozy & it did the job. It’s sooooo soft! 💕 I will not be wearing shoes on this rug so it’ll hopefully last longer. (I purchased yellow)TLDR?ThinSoftPrettyWould suggest no shoes / or low traffic area🦋

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft, color as pictured, and very cute in my living room
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect decor I bought for my living room, and the turquoise color is that same color as pictured. Now soft it is like a warm hug when you step on it, or lay on it. I will purchase again , and you can't beat the price as it is a very good size area rug. Since it is fuzzy n soft I would not recommend any outdoor use.

Creo que la alfombra esta bien, al principio se ve frágil ya que viene doblada y se queda marcada la forma un rato, mi problema fue en el color, ya que no coincide 100% con las fotos es un gris un poco mas azul y yo buscaba que fuera mas neutro.
Decent value for money. After a few days, the creases flattened out from being vacuum sealed. It doesn't seem to shed or lose fibres Looks and feels nice.
Está muy bonito el color y todo, pero para nada está esponjosa, sí viene muy peluda pero plana, no se siente casi acolchada como se ve en la foto del anuncio,
excelente en todos los aspectos. fácil de lavar en la màquina
